text: the following report contains some
disturbing images the beach at Ali Hodja
has become suddenly notorious but on any
day here you will find the debris of the
desperate the sunken dinghy floats in
the surf here the abandoned belongings
of those who enter the water to climb up
two boats for Greece just 10 miles away
tempting thousands to risk their lives
in unsafe craft when the police arrived
here this morning they found several
drowning victims among them a toddler a
child of perhaps 2 years of age he was
lying here in the surf all of the images
from this tragedy are deeply distressing
survivors on other overcrowded boats
made it back to shore but these were
able-bodied young men for women and
children without life jackets there was
no chance a survivor said there were 17
people on a boat meant for 10
they'd reportedly paid 2,000 euro each
for the crossing found at the water's
edge Aylan Kurdi died with his
five-year-old brother and his mother
the policeman gentle in this moment of
shock
a local fisherman saw the bodies on the
shore he didn't want his face on camera
I came to the sea and I was scared he
says my heart is broken on the other
boat that overturned zeynep hadi lost
two children aged 8 and 11 she came to
see their bodies of the state mortuary
it is a high-risk journey with young
children yet thousands want to cross
believing or hoping they'll be lucky
fearful of the violence they fled in
Syria convinced Europe will be better
than this an existence dependent on
charity in a region already overburdened
with refugees there are nearly 2 million
Syrian refugees in Turkey alone Khalid
Iqbal had his leg blown off by a bomb in
Syria then fled to Lebanon but couldn't
support his family of seven now with his
18 year old daughter weds he hopes to
board a boat to Greece I want to reach
Europe he told me and get a better life
for me and an education for my children
that's a refrain I've heard from
hundreds of people on the move in the
last year there were holidaymakers back
on the beach today but in this world
that is two worlds that of the day and
that of the night those trying to reach
Europe will return here they collaborate
with the global banking system to bring
masses of third-world people into this
country to replace rape and murder our
people and my beliefs yeah I was
thinking I've got nothing to lose and I
and I have love to win if I die if they
shoot me or anything I'm not going to
lose anything except my life
